channel.title: Whonix 15.0.1.4.8 vs 15.0.1.5.0
channel.description:
Difference between `15.0.1.4.8` and `15.0.1.5.0`:
* tb-updater * update OpenPGP verification keys * update Tor Browser version from `9.5.3` to `9.5.4` * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/bug-restart-of-sdwdate-in-whonix-gateway-causes-100-cpu-use-of-tor-browser-in-whonix-workstation/9541/22 / https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4969

item.title: Whonix 15.0.1.4.8 vs 15.0.1.5.0
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Difference between 15.0.1.4.8 and 15.0.1.5.0:

  • tb-updater
    • update OpenPGP verification keys
    • update Tor Browser version from 9.5.3 to 9.5.4
  • fix bug: restart of sdwdate in Whonix-Gateway causes 100% CPU use of Tor Browser in Whonix-Workstation / https://github.com/QubesOS/qubes-issues/issues/4969

Read full topic
